person.persName: Landrum Robert Hampton (Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk and justice of the peace)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk and justice of the peace. Virginia native. Married to Delia D. Hampton. Father of Angeline E. Hampton and Harriett E. Hampton. Clerk in Kenton County in 1860. Justice of the peace in the 1st District of Kenton County in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 12-13; Find A Grave, "Landrum Robert Hampton (1814-1884)," Memorial #47324747, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=47324747&ref=acom (accessed May 5, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0357.
